params.name: initial_learning_rate
params.description: The initial learning rate for the schedule after the warmup (so this will be the learning rate at the endof the warmup).

params.name: decay_schedule_fn
params.description: The schedule function to apply after the warmup for the rest of training.

params.name: warmup_steps
params.description: The number of steps for the warmup part of training.

params.name: power
params.description: The power to use for the polynomial warmup (defaults is a linear warmup).

params.name: name
params.description: Optional name prefix for the returned tensors during the schedule.
